title: Tech News: Apple Says AR Will Make You a Better Conversationalist
itunes:title: Tech News: Apple Says AR Will Make You a Better Conversationalist
description:
Why does Apple CEO think augmented reality will make conversations better? Did Amazon terminate two employees illegally because they criticized the company? And Google addresses an old issue that let Android apps know about all the other apps on an Android phone.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
